sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useApp } from '../context/AppContext'; import { User, Bell, Mail, Shield, HelpCircle, LogOut, Trash2, ExternalLink } from 'lucide-react'; const SettingsScreen: React.FC = () => { const { state, dispatch } = useApp(); const user = state.user; const handleSignOut = () => { dispatch({ type: 'SET_USER', payload: null }); dispatch({ type: 'SET_SCREEN', payload: 'welcome' }); }; const handleTogglePreference = (key: keyof UserPreferences) => { if (!user) return; dispatch({ type: 'UPDATE_USER_PREFERENCES', payload: { [key]: !user.preferences[key] } }); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Settings

{/* Profile Section */}

Profile

{user?.name || 'User'}

Age: {user?.age || 'N/A'}

Member since 2024

Investment Sectors
{user?.sectors.map((sector) => ( {sector} ))}
Risk Tolerance
{user?.riskTolerance}
{/* Preferences */}

Preferences

Push Notifications
Get alerts for important updates
Email Updates
Receive weekly portfolio summaries
Dark Mode
Switch to dark theme
{/* Broker Connection */}

Broker Connection

Connect Your Broker

Link your brokerage account for real-time data

Note: Broker connections are read-only and secure. We never store your login credentials.
{/* App Settings */}

App Settings

{/* Account Actions */}

Account

{/* App Info */}

Quantix v1.0.0

Â© 2024 Quantix. All rights reserved.

); }; export default SettingsScreen;
